description.message: Install Netflix Party Chrome extension to watch Netflix in sync with your friends

startVideoMessage.message: Please start the video first and then click on the extension icon.

start_party_footer.message: Please make sure to tell your guests that they need to click on the extension icon to join a party after clicking on your party invitation link.

share_instruction.message: Share the URL below so others can join the party. The recipient(s) should navigate to this URL and then click on the extension icon to join.
